-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("MessageProxy", function (namespace)
    local Handle, GetMessageType, __ctor__
    __ctor__ = function (this, type, action)
      this.type = type
      this.action = action
    end
    Handle = function (this, session, message)
      return System.async(function (async, this, session, message)
        this.action(session, message)
      end, nil, this, session, message)
    end
    GetMessageType = function (this)
      return this.type
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.IMHandler
        }
      end,
      Handle = Handle,
      GetMessageType = GetMessageType,
      __ctor__ = __ctor__
    }
  end)
end)
